name: The Little Engine That Killed EVERY DAMN THING IN ITS WAY
name_original: The Little Engine That Killed EVERY DAMN THING IN ITS WAY
description:
Play as the ghost of a damsel in distress that possessed the train that ran her over, and get revenge for yourself!

If you've got a controller plugged in, you should be able to use the sticks, dpad OR face buttons to control the train.

If you're on a keyboard, just use the arrow keys.

All progress is saved, and you've got as many lives as you need!
